<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="PollingWaitNode" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="org/forgerock/openam/auth/nodes/PollingWaitNode"  i18nKey="nodeDescription"  resourceName="PollingWaitNode"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/PollingWaitNode" ><Organization><SubSchema i18nKey="nodeDescription"  inheritance="multiple"  name="instance"  resourceName="USE-PARENT" ><AttributeSchema i18nKey="secondsToWait"  name="secondsToWait"  order="100"  resourceName="secondsToWait"  syntax="number"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>8</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="exitable"  name="exitable"  order="500"  resourceName="exitable"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>false</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="spamDetectionEnabled"  name="spamDetectionEnabled"  order="200"  resourceName="spamDetectionEnabled"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>false</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="spamDetectionTolerance"  name="spamDetectionTolerance"  order="300"  resourceName="spamDetectionTolerance"  syntax="number"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>3</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="waitingMessage"  name="waitingMessage"  order="400"  resourceName="waitingMessage"  syntax="string"  type="list"  uitype="maplist" ></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="exitMessage"  name="exitMessage"  order="600"  resourceName="exitMessage"  syntax="string"  type="list"  uitype="maplist" ></AttributeSchema></SubSchema></Organization></Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
